title: Sour Cream Cookies
directions: Using an electric mixer, beat together the eggs, butter, baking powder, baking soda, salt, vanilla extract, and sugar together until light and fluffy.
At low speed, beat in sour cream and flour.
Dollop mixture onto greased cookie sheet or parchment paper, approximately 1-2 tablespoons each.
Sprinkle sugar and cinnamon mixture onto unbaked cookies.
Bake 10 to 12 minutes, or until golden-brown. Remove to wire rack; cool.
ingredients: 1 teaspoon vanilla extract (or 2 teaspoons grated lemon peel)
1:1 ratio mixture of sugar and cinnamon (1tbsp each)
